h1: Based on your answers, you may not be eligible for New Style ESA
p1: New Style ESA supports you if you have a disability or health condition that affects your ability to work. If you're on a low income or out of work, you can apply for Universal Credit (opens in new tab) or New Style Jobseeker's Allowance (JSA) (opens in new tab) instead.
p2: Or you can continue to apply for New Style ESA if you still think youâ€™re eligible for it.

whatDoYouWantToDo.label: What do you want to do?
whatDoYouWantToDo.nsesa: Continue to apply for New Style ESA

error: Select if you want to apply for Universal Credit, apply for New Style JSA, or continue to apply for New Style ESA
